maxInjectChars.label: Max injected context (chars)
maxInjectChars.help: Hard cap for injected context block.

autoCapture.label: Auto-capture (opt-in)
autoCapture.help: When enabled, captures high-signal memories locally after each successful turn (no cloud).

captureMode.label: Capture mode
captureMode.help: conservative = only decisions/commitments/preferences/lessons; everything = capture last turn verbatim to daily log.

autoPromote.label: Auto-promote
autoPromote.help: off (default) = stage only. safe = automatically promote only very high-confidence decisions+commitments to reduce inbox backlog.
